column1: Little Goat Diner////Now the fried stuff
column2: onion rings and pickles were really oily.  You can taste it at first bite. The fries were salty and cold. We also ordered a dessert
column5: butter cream and... I dont recall what it was called but if the cake itself was not so dry
column6: I think it would of been awesome. But each bite we needed to put a dollop of icing or whipped cream to help with the dryness.   The service was good
column7: very attentive.  Overall if Im in Chicago fairly soon
column8: I would give it another try.  They could of just been off that night.
